register.title: Became a Badge Creator
register.sub-title: Do you want to design and publish custom badges that other users can apply for to verify real-world information? Also, you could set the price for the badges you create and receive a share of the fee when users apply for them...So please, complete the form and let´s start creating!

register.title: Became a Badge Curator
register.sub-title: Do you want to design and publish custom badges that other users can apply for to verify real-world information? Also, you could set the price for the badges you create and receive a share of the fee when users apply for them...So please, complete the form and let´s start creating!

create.title: Create your Badge Type
create.sub-title: Do you want to design and publish custom badges that other users can apply for to verify real-world information? Also, you could set the price for the badges you create and receive a share of the fee when users apply for them...So please, complete the form and let´s start creating!
create.help-steps: Here you will see a good description about how the process works....
create.previewTitle: This is how your Badge is going to look like

mint.title: Badge Mint - {{badgeName}}
mint.sub-title: Are you ready to get a your new web3 certification?. By pressing next you will start the certification process that will require you to provide certain evidences that proof that you are eligible to get the certificate and the peer-to-peer curation process will start.
mint.help-steps:
Step 1:
"Read and agree the terms and conditions"

Step 2:
"Complete the evidence required in order to prove that you are eligible for obtaining the selected certificate"

Step 3:
"Review the data and submit the transaction"

Step 4:
"The curation process will start, you will be always able to check the curation status of your badge. Once the curation is over, your badge will be available on your profile"

Step 5:
"If the evidence you submitted is found wrong, our curators may raise challenges against your badge and an arbitration process will start. If you want to know more about this process read here (https://docs.thebadge.xyz)"

Step 6:
Disclaimer: "by accepting the terms and conditions.....
mint.previewTitle: This is how your Badge is going to look like
mint.depositTooltip: This will be returned if the evidence is valid
